Project MOSAIC at USCOTS 2013
======================================

## Teaching Statistics with R Workshop

Danny Kaplan, Nick Horton, and Randy Pruim offered a pre-USCOTS workshop entitled **Teaching Statistics Using R**.  Materials used
or referenced at that workshop are available at 
[uscots2013.mosaic-web.org/Workshop/](http://uscots2013.mosaic-web.org/Workshop).


## Other Presentations at USCOTS

We also made several presentations at the main USCOTS workshop.
Materials from these presentations are available below.

 * [Danny and Nick's Plenary Slides](http://rpubs.com/dtkaplan/6177)
 * Saturday Breakout Session
    * [Opening Slides](IntroStatsWithRBreakout/BreakoutOverview.html)
    * [Less Volume, More Creativity](IntroStatsWithRBreakout/LessVolume.html)
    * [Using RMarkdown in Intro Stats](http://math.smith.edu/~bbaumer/uscots/slides.pdf)
